This release version is outdated! Find the current version
here
.
Release LTS.435.5 of October 28, 2024
New features
A new deduplication mechanism was added. It is implemented through a
custom action
.
Users can now set a profile photo in the
call room
.
In the "File" attribute control panel with the "File attachment visual for signing", it is now possible to place
custom actions
.
The button for viewing the business process route is now implemented using
actions
.
Changing the values of control attributes in the "Dashboard" widget now refreshes the analytical panel visuals upon saving without needing a page reload.
A new function, insertText, was introduced, allowing the creation of a .pdf file based on an uploaded .docx file.
It is no possible to check the correctness of update packages with a new feature controlled by a new permission.
When setting up authentication via the "External service" source, it is now possible to set a username and password not only for the service but also for the proxy.
When working with
eDoc documents
, itâ€™s now possible to insert images from the clipboard. Additionally, support for using hotkeys is now available on both Windows and Mac.
Changes and improvements
Locking object type settings for read-only users was improved;
Creating instances in a new tab was stabilized;
The object deletion process was improved;
Automatic registry updates after adding or editing objects were improved;
The focus setting on a row in the registry displayed on the frame was debugged;
The process of saving the visual for an inherited type instance was stabilized;
The possibility to set file extension filters for the "Files widget" attribute was improved;
The functionality of the
"Financial Statements" widget
was enhanced;
When using
drill down
in dashboards with the option to display in place of the parent, users can now return to the previous table with the "Back" button;
In the
"Table" analytics panel
, data filtering by boolean attributes was stabilized;
The creation of a
color palette
is now available when setting up a chart;
The algorithm for locking the
action
button was stabilized;
The
attrOldValue
function was debugged;
In applications with a Redis caching system, the operation of algorithms for building
charts
was stabilized.
The replacement of the "?" symbol no longer occurs when compiling an algorithm;
In the
login page constructor
, the window height setting was stabilized;
Access group audit functionality was optimized;
In the "External service" source, support for NULL was added for boolean values;
The process of displaying errors during
updates installation
via a GUF file was improved;
The
installation of updates
containing search filters, filtering algorithms, or control panel button settings in the registry via a GUF file was stabilized;
The structure of XML files used for sending notifications to the Notary was updated;
The renaming process for the "Database Script (SQL, PL/SQL, T-SQL, etc.)" object instances was improved;
In the Edoc module, large images in paragraphs with hanging line prevention are now properly displayed, table elements update correctly after re-rendering, and the cursor position in documents was stabilized;
In the GreenData mobile app, message exchange times was optimized;
The visual for the modal window managing dashboard parameters was adjusted;
In the Edoc module, visuals for several profiles related to print form template settings were adjusted.
